sentences.en: A: Beijing gives me a forthright and stubborn character.

sentences.en: He has a reputation for being a forthright critic.

sentences.en: He is a forthright person and always talks bluntly.
sentences.cn: 他是个直爽的人,向来都是直话直说.

sentences.en: He sent the arrow forthright toward the target.

sentences.en: He told us forthright just what his objections were.

sentences.en: What people wanted was a forthright style of leadership, with more emphasis on principle.
